root.name: Activision's Atari 2600 Action Pack 2
root.description: Classic compilation that features 15 different Activision titles in emulated form (though technically, one game is an Imagic game). The titles included are: Atlantis, Barnstorming, Dolphin, Dragster, Enduro, Ice Hockey, Keystone Kapers, Laser Blast, Megamania, Oink!, Plaque Attack, River Raid II, Skiing, Stampede, and Tennis. Also released as a Windows 95 optimized package.
